title: The Best of RISK #6
description:
Elna Baker and others share jaw-dropping true stories in the latest compilation of the best tales told on the RISK! podcast

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Christine Lee, Mike Doughty, Elna Baker, Kevin Allison, John Flynn, Liam Howard, Fuck Monster, Scott Whitney, Jules Larson + AG)
